definition: dust jacket (of a book)/protective cover/document seal
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

sentences.english: We saw a boy with a book, one which had no jacket .
sentences.chinese: 我們看見一個男孩帶着一本沒有護封的書。

sentences.english: The dictionary is protected by a jacket of clear plastic.
sentences.chinese: 詞典帶有一個透明塑料的護封。

sentences.english: I like the design on this jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡這個護封的設計。

sentences.english: It is usually printed on the jacket flaps.
sentences.chinese: 它通常印在書本護封的勒口內。
